commands: (n = parseFloat({damageInput}), isNaN(n) || n <= 0 ? null : (a1 = (n - (ConditionsMarkers.hasCondition({token}, 'Rage') ? 5 : 0) - {def}), dmg = max(1, a1), temp = OwlTrackers.getValue({token}, 'Temp HP'), tempHit = min(temp, dmg), tempHit > 0 ? OwlTrackers.addValue({token}, 'Temp HP', -tempHit) : null, dmg - tempHit > 0 ? OwlTrackers.addValue({token}, 'HP', -(dmg - tempHit)) : null))
children.label: Phys Dmg

commands: (n = parseFloat({damageInput}), isNaN(n) || n <= 0 ? null : (a1 = (n - (ConditionsMarkers.hasCondition({token}, 'Rage') ? 5 : 0) - {spdef}), dmg = max(1, a1), temp = OwlTrackers.getValue({token}, 'Temp HP'), tempHit = min(temp, dmg), tempHit > 0 ? OwlTrackers.addValue({token}, 'Temp HP', -tempHit) : null, dmg - tempHit > 0 ? OwlTrackers.addValue({token}, 'HP', -(dmg - tempHit)) : null))
children.label: Spe Dmg

commands: OwlTrackers.setValue({token}, 'HP', min(OwlTrackers.getValue({token}, 'HP') + OwlTrackers.getMax({token}, 'HP') * 0.05, OwlTrackers.getMax({token}, 'HP') * max(1 - OwlTrackers.getValue({token}, 'Injuries') * 0.1, 0.5)))
children.label: Passive Regeneration

commands: {pushItToTheLimit} ? OwlTrackers.setValue({token}, 'HP', floor(min(OwlTrackers.getValue({token}, 'HP'), OwlTrackers.getMax({token}, 'HP') * max(1 - OwlTrackers.getValue({token}, 'Injuries') * 0.1, 0.5)))) : null

{pushItToTheLimit} ? (OwlTrackers.getValue({token}, 'Temp HP') < OwlTrackers.getMax({token}, 'HP') * 0.1 ? OwlTrackers.setValue({token}, 'Temp HP', floor(OwlTrackers.getMax({token}, 'HP') * 0.1)) : null) : null
children.label: Flail (AC 2)

commands: {pushItToTheLimit} ? OwlTrackers.setValue({token}, 'HP', floor(min(OwlTrackers.getValue({token}, 'HP'), OwlTrackers.getMax({token}, 'HP') * max(1 - OwlTrackers.getValue({token}, 'Injuries') * 0.1, 0.5)))) : null

{pushItToTheLimit} ? (OwlTrackers.getValue({token}, 'Temp HP') < OwlTrackers.getMax({token}, 'HP') * 0.1 ? OwlTrackers.setValue({token}, 'Temp HP', floor(OwlTrackers.getMax({token}, 'HP') * 0.1)) : null) : null

commands: (n = parseFloat({damageInput}), isNaN(n) || n <= 0 ? null : (a1 = (n - {def}), dmg = max(1, a1), dmg = {damageModifier}*dmg, OwlTrackers.addValue({token}, 'HP', -dmg)))
